readable.title: 1303335399_b3facd47ab
readable.content: A baby boy wearing a shoulder life saver is at the very edge of an orange pool slide . A little boy has gown down an orange slide . A small boy in water wings and a bathing suit slides down a water slide . A very young boy sliding down a slide into a swimming pool , wearing blue floaties . The small boy is sliding down a pool slide and is about to hit the water .
